mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into app_version (appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{downloadLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uodate_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apkLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apkFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update app_version set appId = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, versionNo = #{versionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publishStatus = #{publishStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, downloadLink = #{downloadLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionSize = #{versionSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, uodate_time = #{uodate_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apkLocPath = #{apkLocPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apkFileName = #{apkFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, versionInfo = #{versionInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo from app_version where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, appId, versionNo, publishStatus, downloadLink, versionSize, create_time, uodate_time, apkLocPath, apkFileName, versionInfo from app_version
